column5: This condo has all the bells and whistles! You will not be disappointed with this well appointed waterfront 3 bedroom/2 bath condo. Enjoy your vacation overlooking the beautiful Comal River in this fully furnished condo. Offering granite countertops, 2 Flat Screen TVs, 2 balconies overlooking the water, full size washer/dryer, cable, internet, and all the comforts of home, this condo will exceed your expectations.
column8: Travelers Delight on the Comal River! - Camp Warnecke C112
